examples: She might have been killed if the neighbours hadn't intervened.
Podría haberla matado si los vecinos no hubieran intervenido.
The President intervened personally in the crisis.
El presidente intervino personalmente en la crisis.
She went over to intervene between the two men.
Se acercó a intervenir entre los dos hombres.
They would not intervene against the rebels themselves.
No intervendrían contra los propios rebeldes.
